item.description:
Depending on how many decide to participate.....we can find a meeting spot and ride to the location together to register.

Details for that to follow later.


www.run-for-the-roses.com

The Second annual Run for the Roses ride will be held Sunday, September 26, 2010 in
memory of Rachel & Lilly Rose Entwistle to benefit the fight against Domestic Violence
and Child Abuse.

Beginning and ending at the Whitman VFW, 95 Essex Street, Whitman, MA.

Registration starts at 9 a.m. ...... Leaving promply at 11:30.

Donation $20 per person

All vehicles welcome! ...... Walk-in's (non-riders) welcome at 12 Noon

Teeshirts for every entrant!

Leave 11:30 a.m. Sharp.

Cookout - Raffle - Music

For more information, email "runfortheroses" or call Joe @ 781-389-9211

group.name: New England Thunder / South Shore, MA

item.name: Run For The Roses Charity Ride
